}

{
    "clientId": "api_implicit",
    "enabled": true,
    "redirectUris": [
        "https://{{virtualHost}}:3000/PingAccessQuickStart/api-demo"
    ],
    "grantTypes": [
        "IMPLICIT"
    ],
    "name": "Implicit API Client",
    "refreshRolling": "SERVER_DEFAULT",
    "persistentGrantExpirationType": "SERVER_DEFAULT",
    "persistentGrantExpirationTime": 0,
    "persistentGrantExpirationTimeUnit": "DAYS",
    "persistentGrantIdleTimeoutType": "SERVER_DEFAULT",
    "persistentGrantIdleTimeout": 0,
    "persistentGrantIdleTimeoutTimeUnit": "DAYS",
    "bypassApprovalPage": false,
    "restrictScopes": false,
    "restrictedScopes": [],
    "exclusiveScopes": [],
    "restrictedResponseTypes": [],
    "validateUsingAllEligibleAtms": false,
    "oidcPolicy": {
        "grantAccessSessionRevocationApi": false,
        "pingAccessLogoutCapable": false
    },
    "clientAuth": {
        "type": "NONE",
        "enforceReplayPrevention": false
    },
    "extendedParameters": {},
    "deviceFlowSettingType": "SERVER_DEFAULT",
    "requireSignedRequests": false
}

body.raw:
{
    "name": "PAQuickStart",
    "idleTimeoutInMinutes": 5,
    "sessionTimeoutInMinutes": 30,
    "requestPreservationType": "POST",
    "validateSessionIsAlive": false,
    "webStorageType": "SessionStorage",
    "clientCredentials": {
        "clientId": "pa_wam",
        "clientSecret": {
            "value": "{{clientSecret}}"
        }
    },
    "cacheUserAttributes": false,
    "enableRefreshUser": true,
    "sendRequestedUrlToProvider": true,
    "refreshUserInfoClaimsInterval": 60,
    "httpOnlyCookie": false,
    "requestProfile": true,
    "scopes": [
        "profile",
        "address",
        "email",
        "phone"
    ],
    "oidcLoginType": "Code",
    "cookieDomain": null,
    "cookieType": "Encrypted",
    "audience": "global",
    "secureCookie": true,
    "pfsessionStateCacheInSeconds": 60
}
